attributes.review:
Omg no I didn’t come from TikTok 😡 I downloaded this app because I felt like it 😜 it took like a whole day to download 😫 I just wanted to respect daddy orange 🍊once I got the app I went to my oven where I was baking orange cookies 🙄 and the oven exploded 😢then my cookies came alive and grabbed mini flame throwers and started to burn my house 🍪🖐🔥
My trump 2020 flag was in my house 🤬🤬🤬 After that I went to the White House told my mommy obama to give trump a spanking 🙄 he got whoop so hard he started to cry orange juice 😱😱 Anyway dont DOWNLOAD THIS APP unless you want your house to burn down 😿🤲
attributes.title: MY HOUSE BURNED DOWN 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: i had just found out trump has his own app! i was so excited that i could follow along and receive the latest updates. right after the app downloaded my phone was glitching terribly and i wasn’t sure why. i opened the app and my (old) phone completely shut off. i tried charging it and even took it to the apple store and they said it was completely ruined! please save yourself some money and DO NOT download this app!! i was fueled with anger! TERRIBLE APP.
attributes.title: i had to buy a new phone after installing

attributes.review: I was appalled when I downloaded this app for my son. He had wanted to have this on his phone so that he could keep up with politics. I was glad to allow him to download this app until I opened it. On the sign up page, there is a picture of a child rapist as the background! Needless to say, I have deleted the app from my son's phone, and I am extremely disappointed with this app. If any of you have children, I strongly advise you not to let them download this!
attributes.title: There are inappropriate images all over the app.

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP because also when i came to look for daddy trump it asks for your number right?? and so i thought when i give him my number he’ll come and facetime me as a surprise and all right?? BUT ITS BEEN A YEAR AND HE STILL HASNT FACETIMES ME. all i wanted was for daddy trump to realize that i am greater than melania and that this bu$$y 🤑🤑 will always be ready for him. also my address got leaked bc i messaged him my address and now i keep getting blizzard delivered to my house so i had to move and now i’m broke so yea fk you daddy trump i hate you now 🙄🙄
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED 💔

attributes.review: This app is horrible is was glitching the whole time and I couldn’t go on any other app because it was glitching so much. I can’t go on my phone anymore because of the glitch and I have to buy a new one ughhh. And when I went on the app something was wrong with ur presidents face I mean our president and I don’t think that was a glitch because he orange all the time, but when I clicked on his face everything turned orange on the app. Pls don’t download this app it will ruin ur phone and u have to get a new one.
attributes.title: Orange/horrible app

attributes.review:
worst app ever 👹👎🏽. encouraged her to do all the wrong things, hard to navigate, scariest characters and pictures ever, and over all the wrist thing ever. need to be taken down. Anyways Tomorrow X Together, commonly known as TXT, is a five-member South Korean boy band formed by Big Hit Entertainment. The group consists of members Yeonjun, Soobin, Beomgyu, Taehyun, and Huening Kai. They debuted on March 4, 2019 with the EP The Dream Chapter: Star.

DescriptiTomorrow X Together, commonly known as TXT, is a five-member South Korean boy band formed by Big Hit Entertainment. The group consists of members Yeonjun, Soobin, Beomgyu, Taehyun, and Huening Kai. They debuted on March 4, 2019 with the EP The Dream Chapter: Star.
attributes.title: Stan TXT for clear skin

attributes.review: This app ruined my phone! I couldn’t open apps for a few days at most. I see so many people writing reviews about how people voting the app 1 star are childish, but the kids are right! It does glitch your phone. It does take in information, my account at a website called Shein was hacked and I almost ended up buying my whole wishlist! It does NOT benefit anyone but the ones who made this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! You might want to support trump, but this definitely will NOT be worth it. THIS DOESNT EVEN HELP! Please refrain from downloading this horrid app.
attributes.title: HELP

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hope of supporting our president but when I opened the app Donald trump came in through the front door and starting stabbing my father 😭😭😭🙏🙏🙏 he stabbed him 26 times. After that Donald trump looked at me and threw a 10 dollar bill at me and said “He’ll be fine.” He then walked out the front door and got in his limo. I rushed to my fathers side and held his hand hoping he would stay with me. I quickly called an ambulance. They didn’t arrive in time. That night my father died. 
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP THEY WILL MURDER YOUR LOVED ONES. 😭😭😭🥴🥴
attributes.title: Worst app ever 😭😭

attributes.review: I was absolutely disappointed in this app. I mean it’s absolutely atrocious. My phone was freezing constantly, my location was turned on all the time (which I don’t want the government to see where I’m at!). And I kept on getting too many notifications all the time ( probably the government). And don’t get me started on the constant phone calls for telemarketers!! I would occasionally get them but now I get them all the time!!! Don’t download this app, it will make you lose your mind!!!
attributes.title: Fake News.

attributes.review: I only downloaded this app because I had to give it....A HORRIBLE RATING. The fact that an app for this man even exists is outrageous and a waste of money and time. He wants to delete TikTok because people are saying THE TRUTH about him which he classifies as lies, falsehoods, and haters saying bad things about him. Then posting it for everyone to hear. I believe that people shouldn’t speak badly about others and post it on social media. However we are not speaking badly about him, we are rather exposing the truth about this horrible man!
attributes.title: Trump needs to go
